entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
